Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the ScreenTronic® Skill you can control your blinds, connected to a LAN blind controller ST2134 or a KNX blind actuator ST3134 from CONTROLtronic by voice command or via the Alexa app.

In the ScreenTronic® blind system, the ScreenTronic® app (Android or iOS) must be configured with the possible control groups and preferred positions for the blinds and remain permanently in operation. A CONTROLtronic Cloud Server account must be created in the project settings of the ScreenTronic® app and the login data must be taken over into the ScreenTronic® Skill.

Absolute and relative positioning in percent (Devices)
“Alexa, set kitchen blinds height to 80 percent.”
“Alexa, set kitchen blinds angle to 50 percent.”
“Alexa, increase living room blinds west height by 10 percent.”
“Alexa, decrease living room blinds west angle by 20 percent.”

My Positions (Scenes)
“Alexa, activate bedroom morning.”
“Alexa, activate bedroom night.”
“Alexa, activate all blinds open.”
“Alexa, activate all blinds closed.”

Configuration
• Setup blind system with all control groups in the ScreenTronic® app.
• Create <device/scene> voice names for each zone, control group and my positions in settings of the controls in ScreenTronic® app:
<device> = Zone + General + Height/Angle 
<scene> = Zone + General + My Position
• Activate Alexa voice control and create CT Cloud Server account in project settings and synchronize project with CT Cloud Server in ScreenTronic® app.
• Install ScreenTronic® Skill in Alexa app and activate ScreenTronic® Skill with the created CT Cloud Server account.
• The defined devices and scenes will be shown in Alexa app.

For further information, please visit www.controltronic.com
